sentences: See magus kook on väga armas.
Magused õunad on parimad süüa talvel.
Kas sa meeldib see magus jää?
context: The Estonian word 'magus' means sweet, delicious or pleasant. It's an adjective that can describe food (sweet taste), things (pleasant atmosphere), or experiences (sweet moment). In different contexts it can refer to the taste of being sugary/sweet, but also more broadly to something being agreeable or pleasing.
